q1: Why doesn't the Women's World Cup get as much acclaim as the Men's World Cup?
a1: Gender unequality or maybe it's not so good.
q2: Who do you think will win the Premier League Title this year?
q3: Manchester City are strong, but Manchester United, Liverpool, Chelsea, and Tottenham will all challenge strongly again.
a3: Personally I hope Liverpool win. It's their time.
a4: They are a good team too.
